He was then buried on Mount Heng.

A person from Mianzhu, Hanzhou.

Prime Minister Liu Yan Prime Minister Liu Yan.

And they also look at medicines.

I think they are not ordinary people.
Prime Minister Liu said:ğŸ”½When will they arrive?

They talked and laughed with utmost joy.
It was as if there were no one else around.
After a long while, they said,
Are there any in the world who can match us?
One person said,
Wang Shiba.
After that, every time he remembered it, he could not seek it.
Later, when he became the prefect, he passed through Hengshan County on his way to the south.
At that time, it was early spring and the scenery was warm and pleasant.
He had a plate of cold congee.
With fragrant vegetables and herbs,
it was very fragrant and clean.
Liu Gong found it unusual.
He asked the post station officer,
Are there any officials or gentlemen nearby?
Where did you get these vegetables?
He replied,
The county has an official garden, and Wang Shiba is good at growing them.
Therefore, the inn always has good vegetables and greens.
Liu Gong suddenly remembered what the Daoist practitioners he encountered said.
He said,
How far is the garden? Can I go there?
He said, It's right here.
So he went to ask and saw Wang Shiba.

Wearing a bull-nosed irrigation hat, his appearance was rustic. He looked at Liu Gong and bowed in fear. Gradually he asked about his hometown and family, saying, I'm a drifter and don't know where I'm from.
I have no relatives.
Liu Gong found this strange.
He told him to sit down and offered him wine to drink.
But he firmly refused and returned home.
He went to the county office and personally requested to go with him to the borderlands. The county magistrate did not understand at all and sent him off at the time.
Wang Shiba also did not strongly object.
Wearing tattered clothes and straw sandals, he boarded the boat and set off.
Liu Gong gradually became familiar with him.
He ordered his wife and children to see and bow to him.
They sat together for tea and a meal.
His appearance and clothing became increasingly shabby.
The family members all secretly disliked him.
The wife said,
How could there be such a strange person?
Why is he like this?
Liu Gong did not give up. He traveled several hundred miles to where he was going.
He suffered from dysentery, day and night, and was extremely exhausted.
The boat was narrow and cramped, not leaving the place of Liu Gong.
The left and right covered their noses and stopped eating.
They could not bear the suffering.
Liu Gong had no disgusted expression at all.
He was only worried and solemn.
He encouraged them to drink soup and porridge.
In a few days, he died.
Liu Gong sighed and wept.
The funeral rites were all done with utmost care.
He was then buried at the side of the road.
Later, the official position changed and he returned to the capital.
He went back to Hengshan County.
The county magistrate welcomed him outside the city.
When they were seated, he said:
The young man you brought with you has returned.
It seems he could not bear the driving.
Liu Gong was startled and asked:
When did he return?
In more than a month, he will return.
Please follow the instructions and let him go back.
Liu Gong was greatly shocked.
At that time, he walked to the garden.
Although the thatched hut still existed, there was nothing to be seen.
The neighbors said:
Wang Shiba left last night.
His resentment was even greater.
He bowed twice towards the house, wept, and returned.
On the day he arrived at the county,
it was the day he suddenly fell ill on the road.
He sent someone to dig up the grave.
Only the empty clothes remained.
After several months, he arrived at the capital city.
He held a high official position in the court.
He suddenly fell seriously ill.
When he was about to die, his family members and wife surrounded him and cried out. Suddenly,
they heard a very urgent knock on the door.
The gatekeeper ran and shouted,
There is someone claiming to be Wang Shiba.
Please report it and welcome him with joy.
Wang Shiba smiled and entered the sick man's room.
The sick man had long been unconscious.
He ordered everyone to remove the curtains and other things, as well as the decoctions and medicines.
From his waist, he took out a gourd.
Opening it, he took out three round pills,
the size of small beans.
Using a reed tube, he drew half a bowl of water,
poured it in, and shook it.
After a while, it was like thunder in the stomach.
After a while, he opened his eyes.
He suddenly got up.
He did not look like he had been sick at all.
The wife said to the king, Eighteen years have passed.ğŸ”½Then she wept and wailed.
She pulled at his clothes and kowtowed twice.
It was as if she could not bear the feeling.
His wives, concubines, and servants all cried.
The king said sadly, I am ashamed of my old feelings.
Therefore, I have come to save you.
This medicine, one pill, can prolong life for ten years.
When the time comes, I will come back.
He took a cup of tea and left.
Liu Gong then asked him to stay for a while, but he could not.
He also wanted to give him gold and silk.
He laughed again.

He was demoted to Zhongzhou for thirty years due to his involvement in a case.
One day, he fell ill.
Wang Shiba came again and said, I want to see the prime minister.
Liu Gong sighed with emotion.
He invited him into the inner quarters.
He also earnestly requested Wang Shiba.
The illness of the day would be cured.
And return the medicine to him.
He then dissolved a tael of salt in water and drank it, vomiting a lot.
In the vomit were three round pills.
Their color was no different from what he had taken thirty years ago.
Wang Shiba asked for fragrant hot water to wash it.
